file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 71-52-01-06 - BONDING STRAPS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BONDING STRAPS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the engine bonding straps. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ENGINE BONDING STRAPS - VISUAL IN- ALL 71-52-01-200-801-A SPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 71-52-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 71-52-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ENGINE BONDING STRAPS - VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the engine straps for general condition and security. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 54-52-01-000-801-A/400 PYLON FAIRINGS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 54-52-01-400-801-A/400 PYLON FAIRINGS - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 414 LH Pylon upper fairing LH Engine 424 RH Pylon upper fairing RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine bonding straps 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 71-52-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. • START 1/2. (2) Install the workstand in the work area. (3) Remove the pylon upper fairing ( AMM TASK 54-52-01-000-801-A/400) to get access to the engine bonding straps. J. Inspect the Engine Bonding Straps (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a visual inspection of the engine bonding straps for general condition and security. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the pylon upper fairing ( AMM TASK 54-52-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand. (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 71-52-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
